name: Shoot Shoot Run
description:
My main goal in this project is to make a multiplayer game using python with pygame library.

The end product game will be free2play easy multiplayer shooter platformer.

You can read on my devlog about the progress of this game.

Here is the next things I need to do in my game before I will publish it :

  • multiplayer
  • reskin the game
  • adding game concept
  • speed adjustment
  • mouse use in game ?
  • shooting
  • basic loading screen
  • advance collider system
  • advance error handling
  •  basic auto save

Will try to update this game at least 1-2 a week.
